original_text: This is so the Israelites will bring to the Lord the sacrifices they are now making in the open fields. They must bring them to the priest, that is, to the Lord, at the entrance to the tent of meeting and sacrifice them as fellowship offerings.
korean_text: 그런즉 이스라엘 자손이 들에서 잡던 그들의 제물을 회막 문 여호와께로 끌고 가서 제사장에게 주어 화목제로 여호와께 드려야 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: This is so the Israelites will bring to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 이스라엘 사람들이 주님께 가져오도록 하기 위함입니다

sentences.original_text: the sacrifices they are now making in the open fields
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 지금 들에서 만들고 있는 제물들을

sentences.original_text: They must bring them to the priest
at the entrance to the tent of meeting
and sacrifice them as fellowship offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 교제 제물로 바쳐야 합니다
